nature_language: [当前位置深圳,目标位置广州,旅行人数2,旅行天数2] 我和朋友想在周末两天从深圳出发到广州玩，想去人比较少的地方，主打一个悠闲，如何规划
nature_language_en: [Current location: Shenzhen, Destination: Guangzhou, Number of travelers: 2, Number of travel days: 2] My friend and I want to travel from Shenzhen to Guangzhou for two days over the weekend. We are looking for less crowded places to visit, focusing on a leisurely experience. How should we plan our trip?
